comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Leger des Heils, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Mooie oude foto.

comment.author: 9537324@N02
comment._content: Translation: Christmas night with Major Alida Bosshardt [ed: famous Salvation Army major in The Netherlands]. The major sings Christmas carols with spread arms. The Netherlands, 1960-1964
